The Nintendo 64 Control Stick uses an analog system to read the angles and directions of its movement. This allows subtle control that is not possible using the conventional + Control Pad.
When you are playing with friends, certain rules for playing
Minecraft change significantly. Full details on this are included on the separate
found in your game box.

You start at 100%, but you won't stay there long. At 0% it's time to start over. Try a little harder next time!

You must fight with
honor! It is against the
royal rules to throw the
king out of the ring!

Collect as many coins as
possible! They'll refill
your Power Meter.

quietly in the hallway!
